ValidationRule.description: Prevents Wildlife and Exotic animals to be made Available for Adoption
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR(AND ( ISPICKVAL( animalos__Class__c , "Wildlife" ), ISPICKVAL( animalos__Stage__c , "Adoption Ready")),
AND ( ISPICKVAL( animalos__Class__c , "Exotic" ), ISPICKVAL( animalos__Stage__c , "Adoption Ready")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Wildlife and Exotic animals cannot be made 'Adoption Ready"
